title: Yuen Yuen Ang: China & U.S. - A Clash of Two Gilded Ages
itunes:title: Yuen Yuen Ang: China & U.S. - A Clash of Two Gilded Ages
description: Yuen Yuen Ang, political science professor at the University of Michigan and author of the book, China's Gilded Age, argues that the US and China have more in common than we usually think and that it makes more sense to see the conflict as a clash of two gilded ages instead of a clash of civilizations.
content:encoded: Yuen Yuen Ang, political science professor at the University of Michigan and author of the book, China's Gilded Age, argues that the US and China have more in common than we usually think and that it makes more sense to see the conflict as a clash of two gilded ages instead of a clash of civilizations.
